version_description:
By popular request, this update adds a new paid map pack: Amazing Voyage, with 30 maps!

Search for "Tower Madness 2" on the App Store and get it FREE for a limited time!

This update adds SEVEN ALL NEW FREE MAPS in a brand new campaign:

The "Physical" campaign includes:

Tesla
Newton
Fourier
Maxwell
Kelvin
Hawking
Einstein

Complete the two new Game Center achievements:

General Relativity - Survive all maps in the new campaign.
Special Relativity - Save all the sheep in the new campaign.

Thanks for playing TowerMadness!

If you have any issues, please visit our support site at support.limbic.com.

This update adds EIGHT ALL NEW FREE MAPS in a brand new campaign!

The "Harvest" campaign includes:

Grape
Asparagus
Lettuce
Lime
Coconut
Peach
Avocado
Dates

Complete the two new Game Center achievements:

Harvest - Survive all maps in the new campaign.
Perfect Harvest - Save all the sheep in the new campaign.

Thanks for playing TowerMadness!

If you have any issues, please visit our support site at support.limbic.com.

By popular request, this update adds a new paid map pack: Amazing Voyage, with 30 maps!

Search for "Tower Madness 2" on the App Store and get it FREE for a limited time!

Updated to 64-bit with iOS 11, support for iPhone X and other new devices, new high-resolution assets and major optimizations throughout.

Welcome back to TowerMadness!

1.24: Optimized and updated for iOS 13.
1.24.1: Fixed crash-on-load on some devices.
